quizDescription: Test your knowledge of World War II history with this informative quiz.

questions.question: Which event marked the beginning of World War II?
options: The signing of the Treaty of Versailles
questions.explanation: The invasion of Poland by Germany on September 1, 1939, marked the start of World War II.

questions.question: Who was the leader of Nazi Germany during World War II?
questions.explanation: Adolf Hitler was the leader of Nazi Germany and a key figure in World War II.

questions.question: Which country dropped atomic bombs on Hiroshima and Nagasaki in 1945?
questions.explanation: The United States dropped atomic bombs on Hiroshima and Nagasaki, leading to Japan's surrender in 1945.

questions.question: What was the code name for the Allied invasion of Normandy on June 6, 1944?
questions.explanation: The Allied invasion of Normandy on June 6, 1944, was codenamed 'Operation Overlord.'

questions.question: Which conference among the Allied leaders determined the post-war division of Germany?
questions.explanation: The Potsdam Conference held in 1945 determined the division of Germany and other post-war arrangements.
